name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easyfill: Text Expander and Snippet Manager

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly insert saved text snippets anywhere on the web, reducing the need for repetitive typing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easyfill: Supercharge Your Typing with Smart Text Expansion

Easyfill is the ultimate text expansion tool that saves you time and eliminates repetitive typing. With over a million keystrokes saved, it's the perfect companion for professionals, students, and anyone looking to boost their productivity.

== Key Features ==

✓ Snippet Management - Create, edit, and delete text snippets effortlessly
✓ Category Organization - Keep your snippets neatly organized for quick access
✓ Lightning-Fast Expansion - Use customizable trigger symbols to instantly expand your text
✓ Powerful Search - Find any snippet in seconds with our built-in search feature
✓ Import/Export Functionality - Easily backup and restore your snippets and categories
✓ Auto-detect Mode - Let Easyfill automatically recognize your snippet triggers
✓ Customizable Trigger Symbol - Set your preferred symbol for snippet expansion
✓ Dynamic Date and Time - Insert current date and time using {date} and {time} variables

Easyfill works seamlessly across all websites, making it the perfect tool for:

📧 Email Composition - Insert common phrases, signatures, or entire email templates
📝 Content Creation - Quickly add frequently used text blocks or formatting
💼 Customer Support - Respond faster with pre-written answers to common questions
🎓 Academic Writing - Insert citations, formulas, or standard paragraphs with ease
💻 Programming - Expand code snippets or documentation comments instantly

== Why Choose Easyfill? ==

★ User-Friendly Interface: Get started in minutes with our intuitive design
★ Works Anywhere: Use Easyfill in any text field across the web
★ Boost Productivity: Save hours each week by eliminating repetitive typing
★ Reduce Errors: Ensure consistency and accuracy in your communications
★ Customizable: Tailor Easyfill to your specific needs with flexible options

== Privacy and Security ==

Your privacy is our top priority. Easyfill operates locally on your device and does not collect or transmit any of your personal data or snippet content. Easyfill needs the permission to "access data on all websites" to work on all the text fields/inputs in any website.

== Get Started with Easyfill ==

Transform your typing experience today! Install Easyfill and start saving time with every keystroke. Whether you're a busy professional, a student, or anyone who types regularly, Easyfill is your key to enhanced productivity.

For questions, support, or feedback, please contact us at easyfillapp@gmail.com.

Visit our website for more information and documentation: https://easy-fill.vercel.app/

Follow our updates on twitter: https://x.com/easyfillapp

Enjoying Easyfill? Please rate us 5 stars and spread the word!
